name: GROGLIN
description:
"GROGLIN"
All Things Wicked Game Jam | Act1

Theme: no text, vampire. 

You've been invited for dinner on Groglin Ave. 
The food was great, the wine was better.
You'd like to go home but can't  find the door.
--

  •  A moody, 2D Platformer about watching your step and measuring your jumps.
